name: The Grey Tear of Gyges
data: It increases the users wisdom superbly.
It increases the users hitpoints pitifully.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
